transcript: you don't need to take time to hit the Big Goal you need to take time to get good enough to hit the Big Goal like that's the tweak big goals take time because it takes us time to get good enough first four years my average monthly listens was 2,000 to 3,000 I didn't need four years of podcasting in order for the podcast to then take off I needed four years to get good enough for it to take off the thing is is I think there's a second element to that which is feedback you can't do the exact same thing every day for 5 years and expect that it will be different the point point of the work is for you to get better
